title: I won't get getting aegis anymore
body: Sorry but the 10 mr is just a waste for my team, 10 mr literally does shit for my team, quit nerfing the aura, if its that big of a deal make it to where we go aura mr over the shield and cdr.

replies.body:
"I only read what others say and complain about it too, screw reading PBE notes" - OP
 
**Aegis of the Legion**
    Total cost reduced to 1500 from 1600
    Aura MR lowered to 10 from 15


** Locket of the Iron Solari**  (Has 15mr Aura)
    Gold Cost lowered to 2500 from 2750
    Shield duration lowered to 2 seconds from 5 seconds

**Banner of Command**   (Has 15mr Aura)
    Total price increased to 2900 from 2750


Also I don't know what you are crying about. Nobody will play mages when Ap got nerfed and AD got buffed hardcore.

> "I only read what others say and complain about it too, screw reading PBE notes" - OP

> Also I don't know what you are crying about. Nobody will play mages when Ap got nerfed and AD got buffed hardcore.

Youre talking about giving an item primarily built on supports a worse buildpath. 

and to be fair, he said "Aegis". not "Locket" or "Banner". I generally sit on Aegis when i buy it, just to get the MR aura before i start building a Frozen Heart for the AS debuff.
It should get its hp regen passive back if they keep it at 10 MR

I think a lot of you don't really understand, before if i wanted to go aegis i could go aegis without having to build into command or locket. I wouldn't need to upgrade until later if my team really needed the shield or pushing power. Now im forced to pick either  sooner just to benefit from the stats i had before. Picking Command or locket should be a choice for later in the game, not sooner.

thats probably the point of the change. you really shouldn't have most of the benefits that you actually care about from a tier 3 item contained in tier 2. there was no reason to up it before you were full build in most cases.
See, Aegis is getting the nerf, but Locket and Banner of command, the items it builds into, are still the same, so... Yeah...
Well, it's not like you'll really need it anyway, considering all the random nerfs to AP items.
Aegis has the double problem of being unfun to build and overpowered at the same time. It should really just be removed if their way of dealing with it is to make it shit.
Aegis is nerfed, but its upgrade (Locket of the Iron Solari and Banner of Command) aren't and still have the +15 MR aura.

Oh, so Locket actually keeps the 15 MR aura? I kind of assumed they'd nerf the Locket aura along with the Aegis aura, since they did that when they went from 20 to 15.

I don't get the "Shield duration lowered to 2 seconds from 5 seconds" thing. It's already 2 seconds, isn't it? I tried it in a custom and it sure seemed like 2 seconds. If you guys are right then Locket gains a worse build-path (weaker Aegis) but ends up being 250 gold cheaper, which seems like a pretty decent deal for me. If you're wrong and the aura is 10 then that's a massive nerf.
"muh ap will be overtaken by adc overloads"
